thread.section_title: Hotel Georgette - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for a short weekend visit!
thread.title_full: Perfect for a short weekend visit! - Review of Hotel Georgette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joseph S
title: Perfect for a short weekend visit!
text:
Two of us went for a sightseeing weekend in early Feb. Located near a number of metro lines and within short walking distance of the Louvre, Pompidou Centre and Notre-Dame, this was a perfect find for a short sightseeing weekend.
The staff were lovely and overall the hotel was exactly what we needed for our short stay. Fairly recently refurbished room which was clean, a decent size with a modern bathroom.
I will be recommending this hotel to my friends and family in future!
